summary: This document is an email chain regarding a proposed budget for jury consulting services in the case USA v. Maxwell. It includes a budget proposal for focus groups, pretrial juror questionnaires, and feedback on opening and closing arguments, with approval given to proceed.

persons.name: Paulette Taylor
persons.context: She is the sender of the email proposing a budget for jury consulting services (focus group, pretrial juror questionnaire, feedback) for the case USA v. Maxwell.

events.title: Proposed Focus Group for Maxwell Trial
events.description: A focus group is suggested to be held on Friday, October 1, 2021, as part of jury consulting services for the USA v. Maxwell case.

keyFacts: A budget proposal for jury consulting services in USA v. Maxwell was approved, indicating active trial preparation in July 2021.
Services proposed include a focus group, pretrial juror questionnaire, and feedback on opening statements and closing arguments.
The cost for grading juror questionnaires is noted as approximately $8,000 per 100 questionnaires.
The email suggests holding a focus group on October 1, 2021, subject to team consensus.
